intent_atoms.description: Developers can access and use the Accessibility Guidelines document to apply VoiceOver labels, Dynamic Type scaling, and keyboard navigation rules for parse tree explorer, detail inspector, and hex viewer.
The Accessibility Guidelines document is linked from the DocC catalog and NestedA11yIDs integration notes so developers land on the checklist alongside identifier conventions.
Running `swift test` covers ParseTreeAccessibilityIdentifierTests and accessibility formatter suites, ensuring identifier and descriptor regressions are protected.
The Accessibility Inspector manual audit checklist is updated in the Accessibility Guidelines document to direct future VoiceOver and rotor validation.
Accessibility gaps must be resolved before appending validation evidence to the summary for audit traceability.
Future rotor customization or phonetic spelling changes will be tracked as discrete @todo entries in todo.md once UX research scopes them.

functional_units.name: Accessibility Guidelines Document
functional_units.description: Provides VoiceOver labels, Dynamic Type scaling, and keyboard navigation rules for parse tree explorer, detail inspector, and hex viewer.

functional_units.name: DocC Catalog Link to Accessibility Checklist
functional_units.description: Links the new guide from the DocC catalog and NestedA11yIDs integration notes so developers land on the checklist alongside identifier conventions.

functional_units.name: Swift Test Suite for Accessibility
functional_units.description: Runs swift test covering ParseTreeAccessibilityIdentifierTests and accessibility formatter suites protecting identifier and descriptor regressions.

functional_units.name: Accessibility Inspector Manual Audit Checklist
functional_units.description: Updated in the Accessibility Guidelines document to direct future VoiceOver and rotor validation.

functional_units.name: Todo Tracking System
functional_units.description: Tracks future rotor customization or phonetic spellings as discrete @todo entries, mirrored in todo.md when created.
